string.comment: Title of Keyman for Android version

resources.string: Keyman na buƙatar manhajar Chrome na\'ui na 57 ko sabuwa.

string.comment: Prompt to upgrade Chrome in the Play Store

string.comment: Prompt to start typing

string.comment: Current text size (number)

string.comment: Make text bigger

string.name: ic_text_size_down
string.comment: Make text smaller

string.name: get_started
string.comment: Menu for getting started

string.name: add_a_keyboard
string.comment: Menu item to add a keyboard

string.name: enable_system_keyboard
string.comment: Menu item to enable Keyman as system keyboard

resources.string: Barin Keyman a matsayin madannin system-wide

string.comment: Menu item to set Keyman as default system keyboard

resources.string: Saita Keyman a matsayin madanni na zaɓi

string.name: more_info
string.comment: Open the Keyman for Android help page

string.name: show_get_started
string.comment: Show the "Get Started" menu on startup

string.name: request_storage_permission
string.comment: Request storage permission to access keyboard packages

resources.string: Domin shigar da ƙunshin madannin, a bari Keyman ya bayar da damar karanta ma\'adanar waje.

string.name: storage_permission_denied
string.comment: Keyboard package installation may fail since Android storage permission not granted

resources.string: Ba a sami damar izinin ajiya ba. Zai iya hana shigar da ƙunshin madannin

string.comment: Settings menu title

string.comment: Menu item to install keyboard or dictionary

string.comment: Menu action to change interface language

string.comment: Menu action to adjust keyboard height

string.comment: Spacebar caption option - keyboard

string.comment: Spacebar caption option - language + keyboard

string.comment: Spacebar caption option - blank

string.comment: Spacebar caption hint - keyboard

resources.string: Nuna sunan madanni akan madannin bada tazara

string.name: spacebar_caption_hint_language
string.comment: Spacebar caption hint - language

resources.string: Nuna sunan yare akan madannin bada tazara

string.name: spacebar_caption_hint_language_keyboard
string.comment: Spacebar caption hint - language + keyboard

resources.string: Yare da madannin kan madannin bada tazara

string.name: spacebar_caption_hint_blank
string.comment: Spacebar caption hint - blank

resources.string: Kada a nuna komai akan madannin bada tazara

string.name: haptic_feedback
string.comment: haptic feedback on key press

string.name: show_banner
string.comment: text suggestions banner

string.name: show_banner_on
string.comment: Description when toggle is on

string.name: show_banner_off
string.comment: Description when toggle is off

resources.string: Idan a kashe, rubutun hasashe ne kaɗai za a iya gani

string.name: show_send_crash_report
string.comment: permission for sending crash reports

resources.string: Bada izinin tura rahoton wata matsala kan yanar gizo

string.name: show_send_crash_report_on
string.comment: Description when toggle is on

resources.string: Lokacin aka kunna, za a aika rahotannin matsalar

string.name: show_send_crash_report_off
string.comment: Description when toggle is off

resources.string: Yayin da yake a kashe, ba za a iya aika rahotonnin matsalar ba

resources.string: Ƙara harsuna ga madannan da aka shigar

string.comment: Additional information for adding another language

string.name: title_select_keyboard_package_list
string.comment: Select a keyboard package to add languages

string.comment: Select language names from the keyboard package

string.comment: Notification that a language name is added to a keyboard

string.name: all_languages_installed
string.comment: Text when all languages from a keyboard package have been installed

resources.string: An riga da an shigar da dukkanin yarukan

string.name: drag_the_keyboard
string.comment: First line of adjusting keyboard height

string.name: rotate_the_device
string.comment: Second line of adjusting keyboard height

resources.string: Juya na\'urar domin daidaita hoto da gyara shi

string.comment: Button to reset to default heights

resources.string: Gyara saiti zuwa yadda ya dace

string.comment: Prompt to type in the browser search bar

string.comment: Title for bookmarks

string.comment: Text when bookmark list is empty

string.comment: Confirmation to add bookmark

string.comment: Page title for saved bookmark

string.comment: Page URL for saved bookmark

string.name: title_package_failed_to_install
string.comment: Error dialog title when package failed to install

string.name: downloading_keyboard_package
string.comment: Confirmation to download keyboard package filename

string.comment: Notification that keyboard package failed to unzip

string.name: install_keyboard_package
string.comment: Title to install keyboard package

string.name: install_predictive_text_package
string.comment: Title to install dictionary package

string.name: not_valid_package_file
string.comment: Notification when invalid package file cannot be installed

resources.string: %1$s ƙunshin fayil ɗin Keyman ba mai inganci bane.\n%2$s\"

string.name: no_new_touch_keyboards_to_install
string.comment: Notification when no touch-optimized keyboards can be installed

resources.string: Ƙunshin madannin ba shi da ingantaccen wajen taɓa madannan da aka inganta da za a shigar

string.name: no_new_predictive_text_to_install
string.comment: Notification when no dictionaries can be installed

resources.string: Babu wani sabon rubutun hasashe da aka shigar

string.name: no_targets_to_install
string.comment: Notification when a package doesn't contain keyboards or dictionaries

resources.string: Babu madannai ko rubutun hasashe da aka shigar

string.name: no_associated_languages
string.comment: Notification when a keyboard package doesn't contain languages

resources.string: Ƙunshin madannan bashi da wani yaren da ke da alaƙa da za a shigar

string.name: invalid_metadata
string.comment: kmp.json metadata file is invalid or missing in package

string.name: minimum_keyboard_version_not_supported
string.comment: Notification when keyboard has functionality not supported by current Keyman

resources.string: Keyboard requires a newer version of Keyman

string.name: unable_to_open_browser
string.comment: Notification when a browser activity cannot be launched
